turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Good afternoon, Example Finance collections, you're speaking with Tom. How can I help?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Hi Tom. I got a letter about my overdue account. I want to sort it out.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: No worries, happy to help with that. Can I start by getting your full name?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Thanks Emma. And can you confirm your date of birth and postcode for me?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Perfect, thank you. I can see the outstanding amount is $650.00. Were you looking to pay this in full today, or would you prefer to set up a payment plan?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: I can't do it all at once, but I can definitely do a payment plan. What are my options?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Sure. We can be flexible. What sort of amount would work for you on a weekly or fortnightly basis?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: I could do $50 a week. That would work with my pay cycle.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: That works perfectly. At $50 a week, you'd have it paid off in about 13 weeks. Would you prefer weekly payments on a particular day?

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Wednesdays would be best. That's when I get paid.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Great, I'll set that up for you. First payment of $50 next Wednesday. I'll send you a confirmation by email. What's the best email address?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Got it. And just to confirm the phone number we have on fileâ€”is 0422 331 556 still the best number?

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Perfect. So I've set up $50 per week starting next Wednesday. You'll receive an email confirmation shortly. If you ever need to change the arrangement, just give us a call.

turns.speaker: CUSTOMER
turns.text: Thanks Tom. That was easy. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: AGENT
turns.text: Happy to help, Emma. Thanks for calling and getting this sorted. Have a great day.
